home.role: Fullstack Developer, Music Producer, Musician, Trader & an Ethical Hacker

projects.welcome_message: Welcome to my portfolio! Here you will find a showcase of my most recent work as a web and mobile developer, as well as a music producer. Discover innovative projects where I combine technology and creativity, developing modern applications and websites. Additionally, explore my talent in music production through compositions and productions. Immerse yourself in my professional and artistic world!

visitor_counter.title: Visitor Statistics Project - Next.js
visitor_counter.name: Visitor Statistics Project
visitor_counter.description: I developed this real-time web application based on Next.js, Firebase, and APIs. The application functions to display the geolocation of visitors to my website. I continue to work on improving the accuracy of the system from 80% to 100%.
visitor_counter.description_extra: This project was made using Reactjs, Nextjs, Firebase, APIs... (VERY IMPORTANT! If you want to collaborate with this little application and see the real geolocation of your city in the list, please accept the permission notification and make sure your phone's geolocation icon is active. If you prefer not to share your real geolocation, just deny the permissions. This application only uses public information about countries. Thanks to everyone üòÅ )

wechemapu.title: Wechemapu - Por los senderos culturales de la futawillimapu
wechemapu.name: Winner LP Pulsar Chile 2024
wechemapu.description: I worked on this project as a producer and composer. LP on the recording and remastering of 24 new and old Wechemapu songs. Project winner of the Pulsar Chile 2024 Award, the most important music award in Chile, in the category 'Promotion of Indigenous People's Music'.
wechemapu.description_extra: This project was made using Studio One DAW, Cubase DAW, Line6 effects processor, and various studio tools.

ep_production.title: EP Alian Andahur - Mongen Ta Molkun
ep_production.name: EP Mongen Ta Molkun
ep_production.description: I created this project as my first music production: an EP of five instrumental songs where I am both the composer and the producer.
ep_production.description_extra: This project was created to share some ideas I had, not as a commercial product but to realize my first concept of music.

folil_choyun.title: LP musical - Folil Choyun
folil_choyun.name: LP Production Folil Choyun
folil_choyun.description: This project was created primarily to produce children's music, but the final product attracted listeners of all ages. We built this LP using FONDART resources, and the project leaders were early childhood educators, employees of JUNJI Chile.
folil_choyun.description_extra: I worked here as a multi-instrumentalist composer for the songs on this album, creating melodies, playing guitar, percussion, wind instruments, and making arrangements.

portfolio_project.title: My Portfolio Project using Next.js
portfolio_project.name: Portfolio Project
portfolio_project.description: I built this project using Next.js to showcase my different skills as a developer, musician, and music producer.
portfolio_project.description_extra: I took on the challenge of creating a website like this using the latest updates of Next.js, Tailwind CSS for the front-end and responsive design, Node.js and Firebase for the back-end, and various APIs to integrate functional applications into the site. You can see the results by browsing through the different pages, where you will find my projects, applications, and contact form. I have also added an English and Spanish language function throughout my website, allowing you to select the language. Since browser translations are often very inaccurate, I implemented this feature using my own translations through JSON, JavaScript, and Context, so I recommend using the translation option I've implemented. Thank you for visiting my website!

testimonial_project.title: Testimonial - App
testimonial_project.name: Share your testimony
testimonial_project.description: I created my own testimonial project using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, Firestore, and Google Auth. You can even log in with your Google account!.
testimonial_project.description_extra: Normally, when you want to add this type of feature or widget to your website, you have to pay for it. So I decided to create it myself. In this small application, you can find testimonials from people who have worked with me. You can even share your own experience if you have worked with me. Let's get started!.

aboutme.title: About My Self
aboutme.subtitle: Knack of Building digital solutions
aboutme.text1: My name is Alian. I am a professional and enthusiastic full-stack developer with a degree in programming and systems analysis. I am actively engaged in both web and mobile development, continually learning new concepts and technologies to achieve more agile and intuitive results. I am dedicated to staying fluid and adaptable to new situations, ensuring that I deliver the best possible results.
aboutme.text2: As a music producer and musician, I have gained extensive experience since I began in this field. I have participated in multiple musical performances at various festivals and events. I have also been involved in several compositions and professional recordings, some of significant magnitude. One of the projects for which I am the producer and composer won the Pulsar Award 2024, the highest award in Chilean music.
aboutme.text3: I am an enthusiast of cybersecurity, constantly reinforcing my knowledge about ethical hacking and AI tools. I am self-taught in video and image editing to provide digital solutions, continually exploring the world of trading, and I have been assigned as an instructor in various IT, cultural and music projects.

hireme.description: Are you looking for a versatile professional in full-stack/front-end developer, building your next web application?, music production mastering/mixing, digital music distributor, advanced guitar lessons, USD/CLP trading brokers and cybersecurity measures... I bring a holistic approach to meet your needs. Let's connect and explore how I can assist you effectively.
hireme.location: Pualhue San Juan de la Costa / Osorno
hireme.chatDescription: Are you looking for a responsible, professional full-stack developer and designer for your website, music producer, trading tips or a guitar teacher? Just leave me a message and tell me how I can help.
hireme.request_call_back: Request A Call Back! Feel Free To Reach & Contact Me.
hireme.toast_success_message: Message sent successfully!, Thanks for contacting Alian Andahur
hireme.toast_error_message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.buttonTitle: You don't know the power of the dark side
